## About

Hello! I am an epidemiologist passionate about good science and improving public health. I am currently a post-doctoral scholar at the University of Pittsburgh.

## Education

* PhD in Epidemiology from the University of Minnesota in 2017 
* MPH from Emory University in 2013
* BA from Bates College in 2009
